title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Tiernan Sittenfeld is the Senior Vice President of Government Affairs at the League of Conservation Voters, a national... <!--more--> non-profit organization devoted to turning environmental values in national government priorities.
Annually, the League of Conservation Voters releases an environmental scorecard on Congressional bills with a direct impact on environmental issues, and a record of their votes.
 In 2011, the 112th Congress has been rated the worst congress in history regarding the environment.
For a copy of the full scorecard and report, visit the League of Conservation Voter’s website:  www.lcv.org
